text: @megynkelly Please if you would, give me an example where the media didn’t tell us the truth on the COVID19? Perhaps exaggerated, but much more ahead than our administration. Who do you trust more Trump lies16,000+ times or the people who report his lies. Like you perhaps? You are media.
